description: ExternalSecretSpec defines the desired state of ExternalSecret.

data.description: Data defines the connection between the Kubernetes Secret keys and the Provider data

dataFrom.description: DataFrom is used to fetch all properties from a specific Provider data If multiple entries are specified, the Secret keys are merged in the specified order

refreshInterval.description: RefreshInterval is the amount of time before the values are read again from the SecretStore provider Valid time units are "ns", "us" (or "µs"), "ms", "s", "m", "h" May be set to zero to fetch and create it once. Defaults to 1h.
